properties.areaDesc: Delaware, OK; Cherokee, OK; Crawford, AR; Washington, AR; Benton, AR; Carroll, AR; Madison, AR; Sequoyah, OK; Adair, OK
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 12:06AM CST until January 11 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Tulsa OK
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a

* Flood Warning for...
Benton County in northwestern Arkansas...
Northwestern Madison County in northwestern Arkansas...
Northwestern Crawford County in northwestern Arkansas...
Carroll County in northwestern Arkansas...
Washington County in northwestern Arkansas...
Southeastern Delaware County in northeastern Oklahoma...
Northeastern Sequoyah County in east central Oklahoma...
Adair County in northeastern Oklahoma...
Eastern Cherokee County in east central Oklahoma...

* Until 600 AM CST.

* At 1204 AM CST, areas of light to moderate rain continued across
far eastern Oklahoma and northwest Arkansas.  This rain will be
ending by 3 AM. Heavy rains fell across this region Friday evening
with widespread 1 to 3 inch rainfall amounts and reports of
flooding. These flood waters will be slow to recede causing
flooded roadways to persist through the overnight hours.

* Some locations that may experience flooding include...
Fayetteville...                   Springdale...
Rogers...                         Bentonville...
Tahlequah...                      Siloam Springs...
Berryville...                     Stilwell...
Huntsville...                     Eureka Springs...
Cedarville...                     Natural Dam...
Bella Vista...                    Lowell...
Farmington...                     Pea Ridge...
Prairie Grove...                  Muldrow...
Gentry...                         Green Forest...

Additional rainfall amounts of less than one half inch are possible
in the warned area.

This includes the following highways,
Interstate 40 in Oklahoma near mile marker 317.
Interstate 49 between mile markers 39 and 93.
properties.instruction:
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the
dangers of flooding.
